## AlRoute.getRouteAction() method

Retrieves the route's action, which may be a shared "named" route or embedded directly into the route's definition.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRouteAction(): AlRouteAction | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`AlRouteAction | null`
